title: US Stocks Likely To Open Higher As President Trump Announces $500 Billion AI Project: Oracle, Netflix, Nvidia Among Top Stocks To Watch
description: U.S. stocks are expected to open higher as President Trump announces a $500 billion AI project involving Oracle, Microsoft's OpenAI, and SoftBank. Key stocks to watch include Oracle, Netflix, and Nvidia.

title: Small Caps Soar, Apple Slips, Treasury Yields Fall On Trump Day 2: What's Driving Markets Tuesday?
description: The Russell 2000 index led the market, rallying 1.7%, while other large-cap indices trailed behind. Apple Inc. plunged 4.3% after a downgrade, and Treasury yields fell as investors were convinced by Trump's pledges on inflation control and lower federal spending.

title: US Stocks Set To Open On A Positive Note As Trump's Second White House Term Kicks Off: Tesla, Apple, Netflix Among Stocks In Focus
description: US stocks are expected to open on a positive note as Donald Trump begins his second term as president. Key stocks in focus include Tesla, Apple, Netflix, and others. The market is optimistic about earnings growth prospects for US companies compared to their European counterparts.

title: IMF Lifts US Growth Outlook, Betting Markets Raise Odds On Trump-Led Economic Boom
description: The IMF has raised its 2025 U.S. growth projection to 2.7%, the highest upward revision among major economies, driven by strong consumer demand, supportive financial conditions, and a shifting policy landscape. Betting markets are also pricing in higher odds of an economic boom under a second Trump term.

title: 4 Simple ETFs to Buy With $1,000 and Hold for a Lifetime
description: The article discusses building a diversified ETF portfolio with four funds - SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust, Invesco QQQ Trust, Vanguard Small-Cap ETF, and iShares 20+ Year Treasury Bond ETF. The author suggests this mix can provide stability, value, and growth potential for long-term investors.

title: My 10 Top Stocks to Buy to Start the New Year Off Right
description: The article discusses several stocks that could stand out in 2025 and over the long term, including Eli Lilly, Meta Platforms, Salesforce, Chewy, CRISPR Therapeutics, Intuitive Surgical, CrowdStrike, Amazon, and Nvidia. It also mentions the SPDR S&P 500 ETF as a diversified investment option.

title: Interest Rate Cuts 'On Hold... If There Are Any At All In 2025' After December's Sticky Consumer Inflation Report: Economists
description: Economists believe that interest rate cuts may be on hold or even unlikely in 2025 due to persistent inflation, as indicated by the latest December CPI report. The Federal Reserve will consider this data in its upcoming interest rate decision.

title: Stocks Rise On Core Inflation Slowdown, Banks Rally After Strong Q4 Earnings, Treasury Yields Plummet
description: Stocks rallied as December inflation data showed underlying price pressures slowing, reducing fears of a prolonged pause in interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve. Major banks reported strong Q4 earnings, boosting the financial sector.

title: 5 Monster Stocks to Hold for the Next 5 Years (and Ideally Beyond) -- Including Nvidia
description: The article highlights five stocks that have shown exceptional growth over the past decade, including Nvidia, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, Arista Networks, and Axon Enterprise. It also recommends the SPDR S&P 500 ETF as a less volatile approach to building wealth.

title: US Stocks To Open Higher Ahead Of December Inflation Data: All Eyes On Banking Stocks As JPMorgan, Goldman, Citi, Wells Fargo Report Quarterly Earnings
description: US stock futures are trading higher ahead of the release of December inflation data. Investors are closely watching the banking sector as major banks like JPMorgan, Goldman Sachs, Citigroup, and Wells Fargo report their quarterly earnings.

title: Banks Kick Off Earnings Season On Wednesday: Retail Traders Bet Big On Financials Ahead Of Regulatory Tailwinds
description: Banks are expected to report strong Q4 earnings, with Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase, and Citigroup projected to post double-digit EPS growth. Retail investors have been bullish on financial stocks ahead of earnings, anticipating positive regulatory changes under the new administration.

title: Wall Street Rebounds As Producer Inflation Misses Estimates, Tesla Gains, Chinese Stocks Rally
description: Wall Street rebounded as December's producer prices came in below expectations, easing inflation concerns and boosting hopes for potential Fed policy easing. Tesla surged on a bullish note from Morgan Stanley, while Chinese stocks rallied on regulatory support.

title: Tuesday's Producer Inflation Report Could Stoke Market Volatility As Fed Path Remains Unclear
description: The upcoming Producer Price Index (PPI) report for December is expected to show continued inflationary pressures, which could increase market volatility as investors remain uncertain about the Federal Reserve's monetary policy path.

title: Here's How Much You Should Have Invested in the Stock Market Today If You Want to Retire Comfortably in 25 Years
description: The article discusses the amount of investment needed to retire comfortably in 25 years, considering factors like inflation and expected market returns. It recommends investing in an S&P 500 ETF like SPY as a diversified and long-term investment option.

title: Warren Buffett Owns 2 S&P 500 Index Funds. They Could Soar 153%, According to a Top Wall Street Analyst
description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway owns two S&P 500 index funds, the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF and the SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust, which a top Wall Street analyst believes could see a 153% gain by 2030 due to factors like AI and the prime earning years of millennials and Gen Zers.

title: 2 High-Yield Stocks That Could Be Easy Wealth Builders
description: The article discusses how dividends and high-yield stocks can be an effective way to build wealth over time, highlighting Realty Income and Vici Properties as examples of reliable, high-yielding REITs that can provide steady returns through dividend reinvestment.

title: 'No Rate Cuts In Q1 2025,' Strategist Says After Fed's December Minutes
description: The Federal Reserve's December meeting minutes show officials are uncertain about the path of future rate cuts, as President-elect Donald Trump's policies and their potential impact on inflation remain unknown. Experts project the Fed to stay 'on pause' for the next few meetings, with no rate cuts expected in Q1 2025.

title: Fed Minutes Reveal Inflation Jitters, Policymakers Signal Slower Interest Rate Easing Path Ahead
description: The Federal Reserve's December meeting minutes reveal uncertainty over future rate cuts, with inflation jitters heightened by potential policy shifts under the incoming Trump administration. The central bank projects a slower pace of interest rate reductions through 2025.

title: US Private Businesses Add 122,000 Jobs In December: 'Slowdown In Both Hiring And Pay Gains'
description: Private employers added 122,000 jobs in December, down from 146,000 in November and missing expectations. The labor market appears to be losing steam, with a slowdown in both hiring and pay gains.

title: US Stocks To Open Higher As Futures Advance: Christopher Wood Expects Trump's Inflationary Policies To Hurt Market
description: U.S. stock futures advanced on Wednesday, but the market has remained sluggish in the past few days. Christopher Wood from Jefferies expects Trump's inflationary policies to hurt the market, while analysts remain bullish on the long-term outlook.

title: Nvidia Stock Closed Tuesday Down 6% After Hitting All-Time Highs: What Happened?
description: Nvidia shares briefly hit new all-time highs after CEO Jensen Huang's CES 2025 keynote, but closed Tuesday down over 6% amid broader market weakness following economic data.

title: US Stocks Could Open On A Tentative Note; Nvidia, AMD And Toyota On Investors' Radar: Experts Flag Over Reliance On AI, Tech Stocks
description: U.S. stocks could open on a tentative note as investors remain cautious about the market's reliance on AI and tech stocks. Experts warn that this overreliance could lead to a market correction or a bear market in the Nasdaq if a market rotation to other sectors does not occur soon.

title: Risk-On Sentiment Prevails for 2025’s Debut, Fueled by US Stocks
description: The risk-on sentiment prevails at the start of 2025, driven by the strength of US stocks, while stocks outside the US and US bonds are faltering.

title: Want a $1 Million Portfolio by Retirement? Here's How Much You Should Invest Every Month.
description: To reach a $1 million portfolio by retirement, the article suggests investing in an ETF that tracks the S&P 500 or a growth-focused ETF, and provides estimates on the monthly investment required based on different annual return assumptions.

title: US Stocks To Open Higher In The First Trading Session Of 2025: Analyst Says History Favors Rebound After Year-End Dip
description: U.S. stock futures are expected to open higher on the first trading session of 2025, despite a year-end dip. Analysts believe historical data suggests a rebound is likely after the recent decline.

title: 3 Reasons Vanguard S&P 500 ETF Is a Must-Buy for Long-Term Investors
description: The article discusses the long-term benefits of investing in the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF, a diversified index fund that tracks the S&P 500 market index. It highlights the fund's low-cost structure, consistent performance, and ability to weather market downturns, making it a recommended choice for long-term investors.

title: This Is 1 of the Worst Investing Mistakes You Could Make in 2025
description: The article discusses the uncertainty surrounding the stock market in 2025, with many investors feeling pessimistic despite the recent market surge. It advises against letting emotions drive investment decisions and instead recommends investing in quality long-term stocks or S&P 500 ETFs to weather any market volatility.

title: Billionaires Couldn't Get Enough of This ETF in 2024. Is It Right for You in 2025?
description: The article discusses the Vanguard S&P 500 ETF (VOO) and its popularity among billionaire investors, including Warren Buffett. It highlights the ETF's low cost, diversification, and strong historical performance as reasons for its appeal.

title: This Warren Buffett Favorite Was 1 of the Top 5 Buys of the Year. Here's How It Could Make You a Millionaire.
description: The article discusses the SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY), a favorite investment of Warren Buffett and retail investors, and how it could potentially make an investor a millionaire through regular, long-term investment.

title: Stocks Tumble As Traders Rethink Santa Rally, Crude Tops $70, Bitcoin Slips To $94,000: What's Driving Markets Friday?
description: Stocks tumbled on Friday as investors rethought the Santa Rally, with the Nasdaq 100 falling 2% and the S&P 500 and Dow also declining. Crude oil topped $70 per barrel, while Bitcoin slipped to $94,000.

title: US Stocks To Open Lower As Index Future Decline: Analysts Remain Upbeat About Santa Rally
description: U.S. stock futures declined in premarket trading on Friday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite dipping slightly. Analysts remain upbeat about the Santa Claus Rally, noting that the final six days of the rally have been higher five out of seven times.

title: US Stocks To Open Higher On Shortened Trading Day: Santa Claus Rally Period Officially Begins, Says Analyst
description: US stock futures are trading higher ahead of a shortened trading session on Christmas Eve. Analysts expect a 'Santa Rally' during this period, which has historically seen positive returns. However, they also caution about potential market corrections in 2025 due to stretched valuations.

title: Dow Jones: A Relevant Benchmark or a Relic of the Past?
description: The article discusses the relevance of the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) as a benchmark for the US stock market, compared to the S&P 500 index. It argues that the DJIA, with only 30 stocks, may no longer accurately represent the broader market, and the S&P 500 should be considered a more comprehensive and accurate barometer.

title: US Stocks To Open Higher As Wall Street Expects 'Santa Rally' In Shortened Trading Week: MicroStrategy, Palantir, Qualcomm Among Stocks In Focus
description: US stock futures are expected to open higher as Wall Street anticipates a 'Santa Rally' in the shortened trading week. Key stocks in focus include MicroStrategy, Palantir, and Qualcomm.

title: Fed Cuts Interest Rates, But Powell Spoils Santa Claus Rally; Dollar Surges To Over 2-Year High, Bitcoin Sinks Below $100,000: This Week In The Market
description: The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points, but revised economic forecasts and Chair Jerome Powell's cautious tone dashed hopes for aggressive easing in 2025, leading to market sell-offs and a surge in the U.S. dollar.

title: 'Sticky Inflation' Appears 'Less Stuck' After November Consumer Price Data, Expert Says
description: Experts say 'sticky inflation' appears to be easing after November's consumer price data came in cooler than expected. This could impact the Federal Reserve's policy decisions in 2025.

title: Market Volatility Halts On Soft Inflation Data, Yet Traders Remain Wary Of Fighting The Fed: 10 ETFs Moving Friday
description: The November PCE index rose 2.4% annually, undershooting the 2.5% forecast, easing market jitters. However, traders remain cautious as the Fed maintains a hawkish stance, with the central bank reiterating its commitment to achieving the 2% inflation target.

title: Fed's Preferred Inflation Gauge Falls More Than Expected: Markets Breathe Sigh Of Relief
description: The Federal Reserve's key inflation measure, the Personal Consumption Expenditures price index, grew less than expected in November, providing relief to markets after the central bank's hawkish stance earlier this week.

title: US Stocks To Open Lower As Traders Brace For 'Triple Witching' Hour: Analyst Says End Of The Year Recovery 'Would Not Surprise Anyone'
description: U.S. stock futures declined ahead of the 'Triple Witching' hour, with the market expected to see the expiry of about $6.6 trillion options. Analysts have mixed views on the market's recovery by the end of the year.

title: Hawkish Powell Aside, This Analyst Expects 4 Fed Rate Cuts In 2025: Here's Why
description: Despite the Federal Reserve's hawkish stance, an analyst expects up to four rate cuts in 2025 as the Eurozone's largest economies, Germany and France, slip into recession, which could impact US Treasury yields.

title: Wall Street Pins Hopes On Friday's Crucial Fed Inflation Report: Miracle Needed To Shift Narrative
description: Wall Street is eagerly awaiting the release of the Personal Consumption Expenditure (PCE) price index on Friday, which is widely regarded as the Federal Reserve's preferred inflation measure. The report could play a crucial role in determining the market's recovery from the recent sell-off triggered by the Fed's hawkish December meeting.

title: Trump Would 'Lead The Charge' To Scrap Debt Ceiling: 30-Year Treasury Bonds Slide To 2024 Lows, Stocks Cut Gains
description: Trump advocates for eliminating the U.S. debt ceiling, a move that sent shockwaves through the bond market and tempered Wall Street gains. 30-year Treasury yields surged, while the iShares TLT ETF dropped, reflecting concerns over unchecked government spending and potential inflationary pressures.

title: 21% of Warren Buffett's "Secret" Portfolio Is Invested in These 3 ETFs. Are They Great Picks for 2025?
description: Warren Buffett's secret portfolio, managed by New England Asset Management, invests 21% in three ETFs: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust, iShares Core MSCI EAFE ETF, and Vanguard High Dividend Yield ETF. The article discusses the performance and potential of these ETFs for 2025, considering factors like trade policies and corporate tax cuts.

title: Billionaire Israel Englander Sells Apple Stock and Buys an Index Fund That Could Soar 180%, According to a Wall Street Analyst
description: Billionaire Israel Englander's Millennium Management reduced its stake in Apple by 90% and increased its position in the SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust. A Wall Street analyst believes the S&P 500 index fund could see a 180% return in the next decade, while Apple has yet to demonstrate its ability to monetize artificial intelligence.

title: Jim Cramer Warns Of 'Incredible Panic' As Jerome Powell's Hawkish Outlook Send Stocks Into Free Fall: 'People Throwing Away Good And Bad'
description: The U.S. stock market experienced a severe selloff after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's comments triggered 'incredible panic' in the markets, according to CNBC's Jim Cramer. The selloff was broad and deep, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500, and Nasdaq 100 all experiencing significant declines.

title: All Eyes On December Fed Meeting As Traders Await Interest Rate Projections
description: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates by 0.25% at its December meeting, bringing the federal funds rate to 4.25%-4.50%. Traders are more focused on the Fed's updated economic projections and guidance, which could reshape expectations for 2025 rate cuts.

title: The S&P 500 Recently Hit Another Record High. Should You Wait Until the New Year to Invest in It?
description: The S&P 500 has hit a new all-time high, leading some to hesitate about investing. However, the article advises against trying to time the market and instead recommends using dollar-cost averaging to invest in the S&P 500 consistently over time.

title: US Stocks To Open Higher Ahead Of Fed's Decision This Week: Analyst Says 'Santa Comes Later In December'
description: U.S. stock futures are trading higher ahead of the Federal Reserve's decision this week, with the Nasdaq 100 index setting new record highs. Analysts expect a 25 basis point rate cut, and the market is anticipating a potential 'Santa Rally' in the latter half of December.

title: US Stocks Likely To Open Higher, Investors Eye Fed Policy Meet Next Week: Broadcom, RH, Costco In Focus
description: U.S. stock futures are trading higher ahead of the Federal Reserve's policy meeting next week. Investors are also focused on earnings reports from companies like Broadcom, Costco, and Amentum Holdings.

title: Egg Hyperinflation Could Spike Grocery Prices: Why Cal-Maine, Vital Farms Are Soaring
description: Egg prices in the U.S. have surged, with the Producer Price Index for eggs rising 55.6% month-over-month and 80.2% year-over-year in November. This could lead to higher grocery prices, but may also benefit egg producers like Cal-Maine Foods and Vital Farms.

title: If You'd Invested $10,000 in Arista Networks Stock 10 Years Ago, Here's How Much You'd Have Today (Spoiler: Wow, You'd Have a Lot.)
description: Investing $10,000 in Arista Networks stock 10 years ago would have resulted in a gain of around $293,000, a total increase of 2,800% and an average annual gain of 40%. This outperformed the S&P 500 index ETF, which gained 223% over the same period.

title: Trump Sparks Records On Wall Street, AI Stargate Project Lifts Chipmakers; Inflation, Tariff Jitters Arise: This Week In The Market
description: The S&P 500 index surpassed 6,100 points as Donald Trump began his second term, driven by strong earnings and AI-related tech gains. Trump's Stargate project, aligning OpenAI, SoftBank, and Oracle, boosted investment in AI infrastructure, lifting Oracle and Arm shares. However, concerns arose over inflation and potential tariff impacts.

title: Market Clubhouse Morning Memo - January 27th, 2025 (Trade Strategy For SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, GOOGL, META and TSLA)
description: The article discusses the current trading levels and strategies for SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, GOOGL, META, and TSLA. It provides key support and resistance levels, as well as potential price targets for bulls and bears.

title: Tech Stocks Tumble On AI Nightmare, Nvidia Eyes Worst Day Since March 2020, Bitcoin Drops Below $100,000: What's Driving Markets Monday?
description: Tech stocks plummet as China's DeepSeek unveils an AI model outperforming ChatGPT, triggering fears of rising competition. Nvidia loses $450B, leading the Magnificent Seven's $600B market wipeout, marking its worst session since March 2020. Bitcoin drops below $99,000 as risk-off sentiment takes hold.
